msbt.message: You know that tiny little stone has secret messages written in three languages on it, ?And each one of 'em is someone's shoppin' list. Gahaha!
Hmm.<10_4 /> I like the wings, but I think I'd miss my arms too much. No trade! And I'm definitely keepin' the head!
This poor guy's gotta stand there without any shorts for all of eternity. Wait, where are MY shorts?!
Even I know this one. That little smirk she's doin' sure has a lotta folks stumped,
Yeah, that's a pretty big shell.<10_4 /> But I've seen bigger.
Ah, this reminds me of me and my pals back in the old days when we wore those foofy collars. Gahaha! I'm just foolin'. How old do you think I am, anyhow?
Aww, they probably made those kids sit still for WAAAY too long while they were paintin' that one. If they're like me, they were probably out doin' a little the second this little art session ended!
Talk about a paintin' that gets you fired up! I'm ready to run through a brick wall after lookin' at this one!
Aw, geez This one's a masterpiece, but I'm not gonna hang it over the mantle, if you catch my drift
I tell ya, when I take the ol' boat out, I'm stayin' AWAY from that place. Gives me the creeps!
You ever notice that this one's just a buncha tiny dots? Not sayin' it's bad, just It's tiny dots!
Ah, yeah, I've seen this one before. It's real good. I couldn't fingerpaint anything HALF as good.
Surf's up, kiddo! Gahaha! I coulda hung at least 10 on that wave when I was a youngster, .
These old action figures are pretty neat, but I'm pretty sure I'd break 100 percent of 'em on day one.
Whoathat thing feels like it's important. Like it MEANS somethin', kiddo. But what? WHAT?!
I know exactly how this guy feels. Just sittin' there thinkin' about one of life's ineffable mysteriesLike where did I leave my stinkin' house keys?!
Hold the You're the one who donated this thing, aren't ya?<10_4 /> That's mighty generous, kiddo!
